text.0: now must we praise and honour savitar the god at this time of the day the men must call to him.
text.1: him who distributes wealth to manus progeny that he may grant us here riches most excellent.
text.2: for thou at first producest for the holy gods the noblest of all portions immortality.
text.3: thereafter as a gift to men o savitar thou openest existence life succeeding life.
text.4: if we men as we are have sinned against the gods through want of thought in weakness or through insolence.
text.5: absolve us from the guilt and make us free from sin o savitar alike among both gods and men.
text.6: none may impede that power of savitar the god whereby he will maintain the universal world.
text.7: what the fairfingered god brings forth on earths expanse or in the height of heaven that work of his stands sure.
text.8: to lofty hills thou sendest those whom indra leads and givest fixed abodes with houses unto these.
text.9: however they may fly and draw themselves apart still savitar they stand obeying thy behest.
text.10: may the libations poured to thee thrice daily day after day o savitar bring us blessing.
text.11: may indra heaven earth sindhu with the waters aditi with Ādityas give us shelter.
